raw_json.html_title: R-Sessions 32: Forward.lmer: Basic stepwise function for mixed effects in R | R-bloggers
raw_json.main_html:
R-Sessions 32: Forward.lmer: Basic stepwise function for mixed effects in R

Posted on February 13, 2009 by Rense Nieuwenhuis in R bloggers | 0 Comments

[This article was first published on Curving Normality » R-Project, and kindly contributed to R-bloggers]. (You can report issue about the content on this page here)
Want to share your content on R-bloggers? click here if you have a blog, or here if you don't.

Intended to be a customized solution, it may have grown to be a little more. forward.lmer is an early installment of a full stepwise function for mixed effects regression models in R-Project. I may put in some work to extend it, or I may not. Nevertheless, in a ‘forward sense …
